name: The Halloween night
description:
This is a very short VN (~3.4k words) about an unusual round of trick-or-treating.

Summary: You were just walking on the street minding your own business, but a strange boy suddenly shown up, forcing you into going for trick-or-treating. Little did you know, this outing was not as innocent as it seem.

Features:

-2 endings

-3 CG

This is a reupload of the small game I made in 4 days for Halloween 2014. 

Update: The game can now be played on browser.
